sentences.sentence: Do you ever miss the city all the way out there in the "burbs"?
sentences.translation: 一直住在上海的郊区会不会想念城市生活？

sentences.sentence: Although they were out in the burbs, they wanted to keep a measure of the sheen of their downtown life - martinis on the veranda, not tea parties in the garden.
sentences.translation: 尽管在芳邻，他们想要保留城市生活的闪光的方法——在游廊上放马丁尼酒，而不是在花园里开茶宴。
